name: Arkadimon_Baby
description: Arcadiamon (In-Training) is a Digimon. It is a Digimon artificially created from the data of various Digimon. One result of an experiment to make the ultimate Digimon, it boasts amazing physical abilities despite being In-Training level. Arcadiamon demonstrates predatory behaviour. By directly absorbing the data of others, Arcadiamon achieves growth at an astounding rate.
